<div class="markdown-alert markdown-alert-warning"><p class="markdown-alert-title"><svg class="octicon octicon-alert mr-2" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="M6.457 1.047c.659-1.234 2.427-1.234 3.086 0l6.082 11.378A1.75 1.75 0 0 1 14.082 15H1.918a1.75 1.75 0 0 1-1.543-2.575Zm1.763.707a.25.25 0 0 0-.44 0L1.698 13.132a.25.25 0 0 0 .22.368h12.164a.25.25 0 0 0 .22-.368Zm.53 3.996v2.5a.75.75 0 0 1-1.5 0v-2.5a.75.75 0 0 1 1.5 0ZM9 11a1 1 0 1 1-2 0 1 1 0 0 1 2 0Z"></path></svg>Warning</p><p>In the previous version (v0.111.0,  a regression was introduced in the GitLab action, where Updatecli automatically enables auto merge request.<br>
This wasn't intend and is now reverted to the previous behavior. By default, Updatecli doesn't auto merge GitLab merge request</p>
</div>
